question: Among the various allotropes of carbon,
option1: coke  is the hardest, graphite is the softest
option2: diamond is the hardest, coke is the softest
option3: diamond is the hardest, graphite is the softest
option4: diamond is the hardest, lamp black is the softest
answer: diamond is the hardest, graphite is the softest
